about_the_game:
Feast your eyes on The Delicious World of Cuisineer! The official artbook is a comprehensive look at the art and design of Cuisineer, packed with early concepts and tasty behind-the-scenes morsels from the team behind the dream.

Enjoy over 100 pages of sumptuous food, hilarious monsters, vibrant landscapes, and the lively cat girls, wolf boys, and other denizens of Paell in all their adorable glory.

Once downloaded, you will find the Digital Artbook as a PDF in the game's local files.

How to access the artbook:
1. Install Cuisineer
2. Right-click Cuisineer in your Steam Library and go to “Properties”
3. In the Properties window, go to “DLC” and confirm that “Cuisineer - Artbook” is installed
4. In the Properties window, go to “Installed Files” and click “Browse...”
5. A file explorer will open with the “The Delicious World of Cuisineer.pdf” file in it!"

Enjoy over 100 pages of sumptuous food, hilarious monsters, vibrant landscapes, and the lively cat girls, wolf boys, and other denizens of Paell in all their adorable glory.

Once downloaded, you will find the Digital Artbook as a PDF in the game's local files.

How to access the artbook:
1. Install Cuisineer
2. Right-click Cuisineer in your Steam Library and go to “Properties”
3. In the Properties window, go to “DLC” and confirm that “Cuisineer - Artbook” is installed
4. In the Properties window, go to “Installed Files” and click “Browse...”
5. A file explorer will open with the “The Delicious World of Cuisineer.pdf” file in it!"
